Income Statement: Total revenue from contracts with customers
Balance Sheet: Total assets as per Balance Sheet
Cash held at banks, other than central banks
Less: Allowance for expected credit losses
Receivables from Merchants and Financial Institutions
Payables to merchants and financial institutions
Cash Flow Statement: Net cash flows from operating activities
Net cash used in investing activities
Net cash flows from/(used in) financing activities
Net increase in cash, cash equivalents and bank overdrafts
Cash, cash equivalents and bank overdrafts at end of the year
Share of the profit of investments in subsidiaries
Receivables from merchants and financial institutions
Payables to merchants and financial institutions
Amortization and additions of contract assets
Redemption of other financial assets at FVPL
Investments in consolidated subsidiaries on equity method
Cash, cash equivalents and bank overdrafts at beginning of the year
Exchange gains/(losses) on cash, cash equivalents and bank overdrafts
Cash, cash equivalents and bank overdrafts at end of the period
